title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Productive Failure Strategies in Mobile-Based CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design productive failure experiences three or more times to solve structured language problems in a CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) environment.
Learners can sustain collaborative discussions with a participation rate of over 80% in Facebook/discussion forums using mobile devices.
Learners can analyze error patterns generated during complex language problem-solving processes with over 70% accuracy by applying PF (Productive Failure) strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
